name: Black Panther
aliases: Luke Charles, Black Leopard, Mr. Okonkwo
powersText:
Skilled hunter, tracker, strategist, politician, inventor, and scientist
Trained acrobat, gymnast and martial artist
Superhuman senses
Olympic-level strength, speed, agility, stamina and reflexes
Genius-level intellect
Wields vibranium uniform, boots, and equipment
